My focus is to share the beauty, culture, and experiences of this unique region with those who may not have the opportunity to visit. Please note that my content is in no way sponsored or influenced by any political or corporate entity. The names and terms used for these regions in the film are for ease of communication with the audience and do not imply any political affiliation or endorsement.
*Clarification:* Since India's political map update in 2019, this region is now officially referred to in India as Ladakh. However, it is still commonly known in India as Pakistan-occupied Kashmir (PoK).
